10.1.hd_quote: An innate sense to know and accept one's place.
10.1.behavioral_axis: Accepts oneâ€™s station and acts correctly within it.
10.1.shadow_axis: Status anxiety; over-sensitivity to perceived slights.

10.2.hd_quote: The successful side-stepping of behavioral requirements... through isolation.
10.2.behavioral_axis: Withdraws to avoid conditioning and keep behavior pure.
10.2.shadow_axis: Social avoidance that limits healthy contact.

10.3.hd_quote: The futile rejection of standards based on a just awareness.
10.3.behavioral_axis: Learns correct conduct through mistakes and pushback.
10.3.shadow_axis: Courting controversy or attention as identity.

10.4.hd_quote: The acceptance of norms until a successful transformation can be engendered.
10.4.behavioral_axis: Maintains current role until the right door opens.

10.5.hd_quote: Direct and overt challenge to norms.
10.5.behavioral_axis: Embodies corrective behavior that others project onto.
10.5.shadow_axis: Becomes a target when projections collapse.

10.6.hd_quote: The constant example that refocuses the complacent on the basic integrity of set behavior.
10.6.behavioral_axis: Lives the standard; teaches through consistent action.
